eventsData.title: Concert in the Park
eventsData.description: Join us for a night of live music in the park. Bring a blanket and a picnic and enjoy the sounds of local musicians.

eventsData.title: Art Show
eventsData.description: Come see the latest works from local artists at our annual art show. Admission is free.

eventsData.title: Movie Night
eventsData.description: Join us for a family-friendly movie night under the stars. Bring your own chairs and blankets.

eventsData.title: Summer Solstice Celebration
eventsData.description: Celebrate the longest day of the year with us. We'll have music, food, and activities for all ages.

eventsData.title: Food Truck Festival
eventsData.description: Sample delicious food from a variety of food trucks at our annual festival. Admission is free.

eventsData.title: Farmers Market
eventsData.description: Stock up on fresh produce and handmade crafts at our weekly farmers market.

eventsData.title: Craft Fair
eventsData.description: Find unique handmade gifts and decorations at our annual craft fair.

eventsData.title: Comedy Night
eventsData.description: Laugh your socks off with local comedians at our monthly comedy night.

eventsData.title: Halloween Party
eventsData.description: Join us for a spooky night of costumes, candy, and fun activities for all ages.

eventsData.title: Thanksgiving Potluck
eventsData.description: Bring your favorite dish to share and enjoy a delicious meal with friends and neighbors.

eventsData.title: Holiday Bazaar
eventsData.description: Shop for handmade gifts and decorations at our annual holiday bazaar.
